fact.description: Today's referee, Nestor Pitana, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Honduras.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Switzerland's half?
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Nestor Pitana awards Switzerland a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a Switzerland throw-in in Honduras's half.
That's a fine assist from Stephan Lichtsteiner.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Honduras.
Honduras are pushing forward but Juan Carlos Garcia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
Switzerland have a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Honduras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Switzerland.
Important block from the Honduras defence as Xherdan Shaqiri fires in a strike for Switzerland.
Corner awarded to Switzerland.
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Honduras.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras.
Throw-in for Switzerland in their own half.
Switzerland to take a throw-in in Honduras territory.
Can Honduras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Switzerland's half?
Switzerland's Xherdan Shaqiri breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Honduras at Arena Amazonia.
In Manaus, Roger Espinoza of Honduras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Honduras are coming forward and Brayan Beckeles gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
Free kick Honduras.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Josip Drmic with an assist there.
Nestor Pitana signals a Honduras throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Throw-in for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Throw-in for Honduras at Arena Amazonia.
Jerry Bengtson for Honduras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Switzerland have a goal kick.
Free kick Switzerland.
Switzerland's Granit Xhaka misses with an attempt on goal.
Nestor Pitana awards Honduras a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland.
Throw-in for Honduras in their own half.
Nestor Pitana waits before resuming play because Carlos Costly for Honduras is still down.
The match is underway again.
Carlos Costly (Honduras) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jerry Palacios.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
The match at Arena Amazonia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Diego Benaglio, who is down injured.
Play has been resumed.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
Switzerland's Diego Benaglio looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Switzerland's Josip Drmic gets in a shot on goal at Arena Amazonia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
Honduras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Switzerland drive forward and Josip Drmic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Honduras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Switzerland.
Nestor Pitana will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
The first-half is over at Arena Amazonia.
Luis Fernando Suarez Guzman is making the team's second substitution at Arena Amazonia with Marvin Chavez replacing Roger Espinoza.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland just outside Honduras's area.
In Manaus Switzerland attack through Gokhan Inler. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Honduras goal kick.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Honduras at Arena Amazonia.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Honduras's Jerry Bengtson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland.
Nestor Pitana signals a Honduras throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Nestor Pitana awards Switzerland a goal kick.
Can Switzerland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Free kick Switzerland.
Throw-in Honduras.
Ball safe as Switzerland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Honduras.
Switzerland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Switzerland's Admir Mehmedi is whistled for offside at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Switzerland push forward through Josip Drmic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Switzerland in their own half.
Xherdan Shaqiri gets his shot on target but fails to score for Switzerland.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Switzerland.
Switzerland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Honduras.
In Manaus Honduras attack through Brayan Beckeles. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a Switzerland throw-in in Honduras's half.
Can Switzerland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Throw-in for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Attention is being given to Switzerland’s Fabian Schar and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been resumed at Arena Amazonia.
Jerry Palacios (Honduras) has received a yellow card from Nestor Pitana.
Throw-in Switzerland.
Fabian Schar returns to the field for Switzerland after picking up a slight injury.
Honduras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a Switzerland throw-in in Honduras's half.
Switzerland push forward at Arena Amazonia and Xherdan Shaqiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Honduras defence.
Corner awarded to Honduras.
Great play from Josip Drmic to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Honduras close to the penalty box.
Switzerland have a goal kick.
Haris Seferovic is on a sub for Josip Drmic for Switzerland.
Boniek Garcia (Honduras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marvin Chavez for Honduras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Honduras.
The match in Manaus is underway once more.
Maynor Figueroa of Honduras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Ottmar Hitzfeld (Switzerland) is making a second substitution, with Michael Lang replacing Granit Xhaka.
Honduras make their third substitution with Andy Najar replacing Boniek Garcia.
Honduras's Marvin Chavez is back in action after a slight knock.
Switzerland have a dangerous throw-in.
Andy Najar of Honduras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nestor Pitana awards Honduras a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras.
Jerry Bengtson for Honduras drives towards goal at Arena Amazonia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
In Manaus Switzerland drive forward through Admir Mehmedi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Manaus Switzerland drive forward through Gokhan Inler. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Switzerland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Honduras's half?
Nestor Pitana blows against Switzerland's Ricardo Rodriguez for offside.
Honduras's Jerry Bengtson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Switzerland have a goal kick.
Free kick Honduras.
Blerim Dzemaili is replacing Xherdan Shaqiri for Switzerland at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Honduras in their own half.
Honduras have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Honduras's Maynor Figueroa gets in a shot on goal at Arena Amazonia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
Honduras to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Free kick Honduras.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
That's full-time at Arena Amazonia. The final score is 0-3.
